about_the_game:
Key Mechanics:

  • Extraction of materials: in Forest Construction VR, every tree, every stone is a potential building material. You will be able to use various tools to extract trees, stones and similar resources, and then divide them into different parts. The collected resources will be needed for construction.

  • Crafting: After gathering a variety of resources, use specialized stations to process them into various building elements such as planks, beams, bricks, blocks, tiles, and much more, and then use them in construction.

  • Construction: The construction mechanic allows you to place an object at any angle and in any location, enabling you to build a wide variety of structures such as houses, towers, bridges, and anything else you can imagine using the materials you have gathered and processed.

  • Interactivity: Forest Construction VR offers players excellent physical interactivity. Players will need to carry, transport, lift, and hold tools and construction materials, which have the necessary physical properties for realistic interaction.

  • Sandbox gameplay without survival: Forest Construction VR does not limit you to survival, but invites you to immerse yourself in the creative process of construction and experimentation without unnecessary restrictions.

These key mechanics will help you create unique structures, enjoy the building process, and immerse yourself in the cozy atmosphere of the forest world of the game. Use these opportunities to have a great time.

name: Forest Construction VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest PC, HTC Vive, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest PC, HTC Vive, Valve Index

short_description: In Forest Construction VR you will have the opportunity to experience all the joy of free construction with realistic physics, while being in a pleasant forest environment. A sandbox where the only limit is your imagination. Create a simple shelter or a piece of art? It's up to you!
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
